body_html: The point is torch.distributions.Multinomial was never part of the standard API in any of our releases, so if we ever want to change it then now is the time. I never said I want to remove .multinomial(), but rather deprecate it.
body_text: The point is torch.distributions.Multinomial was never part of the standard API in any of our releases, so if we ever want to change it then now is the time. I never said I want to remove .multinomial(), but rather deprecate it.
body: The point is `torch.distributions.Multinomial` was never part of the standard API in any of our releases, so if we ever want to change it then now is the time. I never said I want to remove `.multinomial()`, but rather deprecate it.
